TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner

summary.span: 在设计器宿主中为 控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a designer host for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计器宿主中，当用户从源切换到设计视图中，标记源代码的描述的控件派生自抽象类进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control that is derived from the abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 当用户切换回源视图时，设计时控件是保存到标记的源代码，编辑到 Web 页的标记。When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 类的派生自控件提供设计时支持设计器宿主中。The class provides design-time support for controls that are derived from the in a designer host. 类属性提供了以下功能：The class properties provide the following functionality: - 属性返回对象，它通常包含一个对象，派生自继承树中每个级别的设计器的类。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 属性到数据源的设计器提供访问权限，如果已定义。The property provides access to the designer of the data source, if one is defined. - 属性获取绑定到关联控件的数据源的默认视图。The property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control. - 属性确定控件是否应呈现其默认操作列表选择和创建数据源。The property determines whether the control should render its default action lists for choosing and creating data sources. 类方法提供了以下功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法将执行操作所需连接到当前的数据源。The method performs the actions that are necessary to connect to the current data source. - 方法将创建关联控件的新数据源。The method creates a new data source for the associated control. - 方法将派生自该关联的控件绑定与设计时数据源的类。The method binds the associated control that is derived from the class to a design-time data source. - 方法将执行操作所需断开与当前的数据源的连接。The method performs the actions that are necessary to disconnect from the current data source. - 方法获取的数据源，可以在关联控件的设计时使用。The method gets a data source that can be used at design time for the associated control. - 方法构造可在关联控件的设计时使用的示例数据源。The method constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control. - 方法用于移除属性或添加其他属性或者隐藏关联控件派生自的属性类。The method is used to remove properties from or add additional properties to or to shadow properties of the associated control that is derived from the class. ## Examples 以下代码示例演示如何扩展类，以更改由派生的控件的外观控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 该示例从`MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl`类从。The example derives the `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl` class from the . `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl`类只是一个副本的。The `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl` class is simply a copy of the . 该示例还从`MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner`类派生类和位数对象`MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner`上`MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl`类。The example also derives the `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner` class from the class and places a object for the `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner` on the `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl` class. `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner`重写方法以使属性中可见**属性**网格在设计时。The `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner` overrides the method to make the property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time. 它将替代方法来生成占位符的标记，如果设计时标记为`null`或，或如果的设计时标记是一个空``块 (即，如果之间没有任何内部标记``It overrides the method to generate the markup for a placeholder if the design time markup is `null` or , or if the design-time markup is an empty `` block (that is, if there is no inner markup between the `` 和``标记)。and `` tags). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner/CS/hierarchicaldatabounddesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner/VB/hierarchicaldatabounddesigner.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在内部构建的新实例类创建派生自的关联的控件时类或该控件在设计图面上的副本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the class or a copy of that control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ActionLists As DesignerActionListCollection

summary.span: 获取此设计器的设计器操作列表集合。

span.span: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
The associated with this designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性创建一个空对象。The property creates an empty object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool ConnectToDataSource() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function ConnectToDataSource () As Boolean

summary.span: 执行与当前数据源连接所必要的操作。

span.span: Performs the actions that are necessary to connect to the current data source.

returns.span: 如果执行了与新数据源的连接，则为 ；如果新旧数据源相同，则为 。

span.span: if a connection to a new data source was performed; if the old and new data source are the same.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法则断开和事件从以前的数据源，然后将这些事件附加到新的数据源。The method disconnects the and events from the previous data source, and then attaches these events to the new data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void CreateDataSource() cil managed

summary.span: 创建关联控件的新数据源。

span.span: Creates a new data source for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法显示一个对话框，可用于创建派生自的关联控件的数据源类。The method displays a dialog box that can be used to create a data source for the associated control that is derived from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DataBind(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub DataBind (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: 要绑定到设计时数据源的 控件。

span.span: The to bind to the design-time data source.

summary.span: 将关联控件绑定到设计时数据源。

span.span: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的第一个集的属性控件以引用的设计时数据源和集属性设置为`null`。The method first sets the property of the control to reference the design-time data source and sets the property to `null`. 回调派生自控件的方法类，以绑定到设计时数据源。The calls back to the method of the control that is derived from the class to bind to the design-time data source. 最后，它将还原的原始值和属性。Finally, it restores the original values of the and properties. `dataBoundControl`参数是派生自控件与此设计器中或该控件的副本相关联的类。The `dataBoundControl` parameter is the control that is derived from the class that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 用于访问数据源的设计器（如果已为数据绑定选择了设计器）。

span.span: Provides access to the designer of the data source, when one is selected for data binding.

value.span: 由 派生的关联控件数据源的设计器，它可以实现 。

span.span: The designer for the data source of the associated control derived from the , which implements the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用来访问数据源设计器的属性或派生自的关联控件属性类。The data source can be accessed using the property of the designer or the property of the associated control that is derived from the class.

value.span: 表示数据源默认视图的 。

span.span: The representing the default view of the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用来访问数据源设计器的属性或派生自的关联控件属性类。The data source can be accessed using the property of the designer or the property of the associated control that is derived from the class.

summary.span: 执行与当前数据源断开所必要的操作。

span.span: Performs the actions that are necessary to disconnect from the current data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法则断开和来自当前数据源的事件。The method disconnects the and events from the current data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable GetDesignTimeDataSource() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function GetDesignTimeDataSource () As IHierarchicalEnumerable
abstract member GetDesignTimeDataSource : unit -> System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable override this.GetDesignTimeDataSource : unit -> System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable

summary.span: 获取一个设计时使用的关联控件的数据源。

span.span: Gets a data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.

returns.span: 实现 接口的对象，可用作 派生的控件的数据源。

span.span: An object implementing the interface that can be used as a data source for controls derived from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 出于性能原因，最好使用简单的预定义的数据源在设计时而不是实际数据源控件派生自类。For performance reasons, it is better to use a simple predefined data source at design time rather than the actual data source for the control that is derived from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable GetSampleDataSource() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function GetSampleDataSource () As IHierarchicalEnumerable
abstract member GetSampleDataSource : unit -> System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable override this.GetSampleDataSource : unit -> System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable

summary.span: 构造可在设计时用于关联控件的示例数据源。

span.span: Constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.

returns.span: 实现 接口的对象，可用作 派生的控件的数据源。

span.span: An object implementing the interface that can be used as a data source for controls derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过构造的示例数据方法具有空路径的单个节点。The sample data constructed by the method has a single node with an empty path.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现添加的和隐藏的属性的 的集合。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供设计器使用，以从“属性”网格的显示中移除属性或向其添加其他属性或者隐藏关联控件的属性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用派生自方法来隐藏相应的设计时属性在设计器实现，使用的各种控件属性和将属性添加到或移除属性**属性**网格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 为控件派生自类，方法创建设计时属性，以隐藏和属性。For controls that are derived from the class, the method creates design-time properties to shadow the and properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法的类中继承自类，以更改**属性**网格控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the **Properties** grid of the control at design time. 示例使属性中可见**属性**网格。The example makes the property visible in the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner/CS/hierarchicaldatabounddesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner/VB/hierarchicaldatabounddesigner.vb#3)]

span.para: 重写方法将属性添加到或更改设计时属性集合中的属性的特性。请务必在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。
Override the method to add properties to or change the attributes of properties in the design-time property collection. Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property UseDataSourcePickerActionList As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UseDataSourcePickerActionList { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否应呈现其默认操作列表，该操作列表包含一个数据源 ID 下拉列表和相关任务。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should render its default action lists, which contain a data source ID drop-down list and related tasks.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认操作列表类包含**选择数据源**菜单项具有下拉列表，从中可选择数据源和任何其他操作项上的操作列表的数据源控件。The default action lists for the class include a **Choose Data Source** menu item that has a drop-down list from which a data source can be selected, and any other action items on the action lists of the data source control. 通常情况下，数据源列表将包括控制操作**配置数据源**并**刷新架构**菜单项，虽然这些不需要始终是存在。Typically, the data source control action lists will include **Configure Data Source** and **Refresh Schema** menu items, although these need not always be present. **配置数据源**菜单项显示一个对话框，适合于所选择的数据源的类型。The **Configure Data Source** menu item displays a dialog box that is appropriate to the type of data source chosen. 例如，如果数据源控件，**配置数据源**对话框中，可选择的业务对象。For example, if the data source is an control, the **Configure Data Source** dialog box allows you to choose a business object for the . **刷新架构**菜单项可刷新数据源应用设计器架构。The **Refresh Schema** menu item refreshes the designer schema that is applied by the data source.

span.para: 如果不想使用默认数据源操作列表项来显示，重写属性以返回。如果你想要显示其他数据源操作列表项，重写以返回并重写属性来添加适当对象添加到它将返回的对象。

If you do not want the default data source action list items to be displayed, override the property to return . If you want other data source action list items to be displayed, override the to return and override the property to add the appropriate objects to the object that it returns.
